description.en:
DeltaChain inherits and develops the Ethereum technology platform, with open source P2P accelerates all transactions quickly, minimises risk, enhances high security, and does not involve any third parties. DeltaChain has a clearly transparent development roadmap. All DeltaChain wallet versions will be fully up to date where customers can secure on wallets or trade seamlessly on the world exchange.

Our trading use Blockchain technology to ensure all investors enjoying safe and secure processing on our stable shared platform. Our decentralised platform removes third party involvement thus allowing absolute transparent deals between investors. We utilise popular Ethereum blockchain allowing other developers to join in seamlessly without worries.
